name: The HECC-IT Demo
description:
Here is a selection of games I have produced using HECC-IT.

HECC-IT (Hypertext Editing and Creation Code Integrated Toolkit) is a hypertext game authoring tool I'm making for my degree's final project, and, once I'm done with making it, I will be releasing it publicly (for free ofc). However, in the meantime, here are some demonstration games produced with the tool, so you can get a decent idea of the sort of stuff the tool is capable of.

Please note: the 'back' buttons present within these games are 'back' buttons in the sense of 'you can click this to go back to the previous passage in this game'. If you wish to return to the main menu after selecting a game to play, you can do that by refreshing this webpage, or by pressing your browser's back button.

CREDITS
